info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: My stay was an amazing experience. It was right next to the roof and had an incredibly beautiful yard. It was very peaceful when I spent time sitting on this terrace. The house owners were very cooperative. They have always provided support according to the guest's needs.I would like to come again if I visit Chittagong again. I highly recommend this place. Homely environment.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Stunning backyard! Lush gardens and natural beauty stole the show. Host was wonderful too!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: will be visiting there on my next trip

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Beautiful rooftop garden! The host was very easy to communicate with.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Caretaker were helpful and the AC bedroom was comfortable however the big living room was too hot to stay at because there was no AC there but one ventilator, which didn’t really help in that heat. So consider that if you book in Summer.
In the Kitchen you could heat up something in the microwave but not have a big cookout.
They had a really pretty terrace with pretty plants were you could walk around at late noon.
All in one it was safe there and the neighbours were nice and even send us food for Iftar.
I would visit again
Great place to stay and Amazing hospitality experience.Very helpful and responsive.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Nice place with rooftop garden. You will get gardent view if you keep the window open. Big bedroom with bigger living room with sofa, dining table etc. and a nice kitchen too. Very friendly host and caretaker. I hope to be there again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed one night

rating_comment:
Very handy location as no traffic so going any where in chittagong is very easy. the property located in a secured on going developing residential area but very close to the main road and all amenities. His son and family are very helpful including his caretaker. inshallah we will come again. thanks and wish their family all the best.
Arif
sydney
